    • incPlayerBank

      public void incPlayerBank(int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      increments Player bank by the amount specified by each parameter for each of their corresponding gem types.
      Parameters:
      rubyAmount - amount to increase ruby stack by.
      emeraldAmount - amount to increase emerald stack by.
      sapphireAmount - amount to increase sapphire stack by.
      diamondAmount - amount to increase diamond stack by.
      onyxAmount - amount to increase onyx stack by.
      goldAmount - amount to increase gold stack by.

    • hasAtLeast

      public boolean hasAtLeast(int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      Returns true if player has at least specified amounts of each gem type in their bank, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      rubyAmount - minimum amount or rubies player should have
      emeraldAmount - minimum amount or emerald player should have
      sapphireAmount - minimum amount or sapphire player should have
      diamondAmount - minimum amount or diamond player should have
      onyxAmount - minimum amount or onyx player should have
      goldAmount - minimum amount or gold player should have
      Returns:
      true if player has at least input amounts of each gem type, false otherwise.
